Description: - 3 Bedrooms, 1 Bathrooms on Buttonwood St. - Convenient to South Bay Plaza, South Boston, UMass, Star Market, JFK/Umass T stop on the Red line, 93, Carson Beach, bars, restaurants, and more! - Beautifully renovated kitchen with white granite countertops and stainless steel appliances - Hardwood flooring throughout - Laundry in unit - Outdoor space - Video security camera
